revision.comment: Página creada con «Create or edit an IARPA Concept: {{#forminput:form=IARPASourceConcept|autocomplete on category=IARPASourceConcept|namespace=IConcept}} ---- [[MappingSummary|Frame to Conce...»
revision.text: Create or edit an IARPA Concept: {{#forminput:form=IARPASourceConcept|autocomplete on category=IARPASourceConcept|namespace=IConcept}} ---- [[MappingSummary|Frame to Concept mapping summary]] ---- {{#ask: [[Category:IARPASourceConcept]] [[:IConcept:+]] |?HasConceptOwner=Owner |?HasConceptDefinition=Definition |?HasConceptLUs=LUs |format=table |sort=HasConceptOwner, }} ---- This category uses the form [[Has default form::IARPASourceConcept]].

revision.comment: Página creada con «This category uses the form [[Has default form::IARPATargetConcept]]. Create or Edit a new Target Concept: {{#forminput:form=IARPATargetConcept|namespace=IConcept|autocomp...»
revision.text:
This category uses the form [[Has default form::IARPATargetConcept]].
Create or Edit a new Target Concept: {{#forminput:form=IARPATargetConcept|namespace=IConcept|autocomplete on category=IARPATargetConcept}} ---- {{#ask: [[Category:IARPATargetConcept]] |?HasConceptOwner=Owner |?HasConceptType=Type |?HasConceptGroup=Group |?HasConceptDefinition=Definition |?Is linked to from frame=Frames |format=table |sort=HasConceptGroup,HasConceptOwner, }} ----

This category uses the form [[Has default form::IARPATargetConcept]].
Create or Edit a new Target Concept: {{#forminput:form=IARPATargetConcept|namespace=IConcept|autocomplete on category=IARPATargetConcept}} ---- {{#ask: [[Category:IARPATargetConcept]] |?HasConceptOwner=Owner |?HasConceptType=Type |?HasConceptGroup=Group |?HasConceptDefinition=Definition |?Is linked to from frame=Frames |format=table |sort=HasConceptGroup,HasConceptOwner, }} ----

This category uses the form [[Has default form::Metaphor family]]. Pages of this type should be edited by [[has default form::Metaphor family]].

This is the VettedFrame category. It is used to identify the portion of Frames that were manually entered or approved by Linguistic analysts. This category uses the form [[Has default form::Frame]].
[[Category:Frame]]
